Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 50th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1986...
Injured on 4/16/1987 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/26/1988 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1990, off Len Barker (CLE)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/1990, off Rick Reed (BOS)...
Injured on 4/19/1992 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 7/8/1992...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1993, hitting .340 with 10 HR, 33 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1993, hitting .391 with 4 HR, 19 RBI...
Was selected to the 1993 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 7/14/1993...
Drove in 8 runs against Oakland on 5/6/1994...
Had 5 hits with 8 RBI against Texas on 9/8/1994...
Hit 3 homeruns against Texas, driving in 8 runs on 9/8/1994...

Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Texas on 4/9/1995...
Was selected to the 1995 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1995, hitting .545 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 1996...
Injured on 5/16/1998 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1998, hitting .520 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
